pr_title: [HUDI-1012] Add unit test for snapshot reads

timeline.bodyText: @satishkotha Does this test make sense to add to hudi-hadoop-mr where the inputformats are being tested ?
timeline.author: n3nash

replies.bodyText: I liked hudi-client because i could validate records contents in addition to metadata.  But, thanks for the feedback, added sanity test in hadoop-mr as well.
replies.author: satishkotha

timeline.message: Add unit test for snapshot reads in hadoop-mr
Add unit test for snapshot reads in hadoop-mr
